Desc.entry: A registered charity that offers support and advice for individuals of African and African-Caribbean origin who are experiencing mental health difficulties. Organises lunch clubs and other groups, including a carers' group, men's group and women's group. Offers community outreach services and supported accommodation, runs a day centre and offers home and hospital visiting. Provides an advocacy service especially around health care issues and aims to train, inform and act on a consultancy basis to health care professionals. Also provides art therapy sessions. Resources include room hire and equipped kitchen. Participates in World Mental Health Day.
